content.raw:
All the tests are only running for `i == 0`. I just changed these to `i < 2` and they're all failing with:

`C++ exception with description "map::at" thrown in the test body.`

You can try branch `view_cache_rebuild_louise`. I also added a test which adds an entity which I don't expect to pass based on my earlier comment, but I could be mistaken.
